summary: Your arrows will fly right through her
descriptionHtml:
After killing or physically wounding friend after friend for being in the way of the Dragonborns arrow, The Dragonborn grows tired of this and seeks help from the mages of Winterhold who summon a formidable opponent Raina back onto this world as a ghost. The Dragonborn aims his bow at Raina and shoots, The arrow ends up at the other side and Raina and the dragonborn laugh knowing that there friendship is now eternal.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What this mod does:
Adds Raina The Ghost A follower who cant be harmed by anything to The Hall Of The Elements in the Mages College of Winterhold.

Updates:
Raina is now summonable, Spelltome is on Raina.
author: thelawfull
